PLoS Computational Biology 16(12): e1008493  (2020) View 836,655 downloads 25011 forum posts 313 followers Last updated Mar 20, 2025 Project Statistics Join Mailing Lists Suggest Idea Scott Delp Jennifer Hicks Ayman Habib Carmichael Ong Ajay Seth Thomas Uchida SimTK is maintained through Grant R01GM124443 01A1 from the National Institutes of Health (NIH). It was initially developed as part of the Simbios project funded by the NIH as part of the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 GM072970.
